relevant_communication:
Participation to the SCCREEN project (SC5 15a 2016) as a  stakeholder providing expertise on WEEE and batteries recycling as well as related CRMs. 
Participating in the call SC5 15f on wood mobilization in Europe and future dissemination of innovative practices.
goals__remit:
The Cluster CIME brings together Experts, Engineering companies and SMEs in France, Luxemburg and Belgium, with more than 20 years of experience in the Circular Economy and Materials. 
 
Members’ skills are multidisciplinary and complementary; our broad innovative and strategical view aims at implementing technical, economical and strategical solutions in line with industrial and municipal waste prevention, valorization and treatment. 
 
Having developed a strong expertise in metal (WEEE and CRM) and wood recycling we implement our know-how focusing on national projects (for ex Ademe in France) and we provide innovative solutions to companies, municipalities and the European Commission through Interreg and H2020 SC2 & 5 projects.
